Blizzard/Twister


*Blizzard begins walking*

Blizzard:..Who am I kidding..=
.I don't know what to do, I probably eat myself!

*Blizzard says sadly*

Bl=
izzard: It seems the the whole world is against me accept for you. Even my =
sister. I know the way she was acting, not normal.

*Blizzard says to Sinis=
ter and sighs and continues walking*



*Twister looks at Sinesis*

Twister=
: It was up to me tell the others too but I didn't because I didn't do it b=
efore I tried to stop Retroflame and I didn't after because I was too conce=
rned with saving myself....That was the past and the future can be differen=
t but it isn't looking up now that we have no home...

*Twister says to Sin=
esis

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups=
.com 
  Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:51 AM
  Subject: Re: The End is N=
ear...........


  "Okay." Sinister said lamely. He walked off with Blizzar=
d whenever Blizzard walks off.

  Sinesis sighs.
   
  "I always said I nev=
er made any mistakes. That I was perfect, but once, I was supposed to fight=
 some criminals that had a bounty on them, but I was not to harm anyone els=
e. I killed that criminal for my own selfish needs, but he had a time bomb =
set. I thoguht I could disarm it, but all I did was set the time even lower=
, and some bots didn't have time to get away. I managed to get away since I=
 knew about it, but I never told them, so that's why I chose the evil path =
in life, I felt I had done something evil..." Sinesis said...
    ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

    Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:24 AM
    Subject: Re: The End is Ne=
ar...........


    Twister/Blizzard


    Twister: I was sent on a mission=
 to stop another bot named Retroflame. She planed to blow up some other bot=
s that didn't know a thing because she claimed that they were in her way. I=
 was given no partners for there were none to give. I didn't stop them....I=
 tried but I was shelfish and excaped in a pod thinking of only myself and =
other bots were killed not only because of Retroflame but also because of m=
e....I deserved to be near that bomb.....There were missions before that bu=
t I wish not speak of for I have failed too many.......I wouldn't kill myse=
lf for I would probably be sent back down for the Matrix would not want my =
selfish kind in.......

    *Twister says to Sinesis*


    *Blizzard sighs=
 and looks up again still frowning*

    Blizzard: We need to find shelter,=
 my love.

    *Blizzard says to Sinister*

      ----- Original Message --=
--- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturda=
y, August 05, 2000 3:30 AM
      Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


=
      Sinesis walks to Twister.

      "A failure? When were you a failure?=
 Tell me of one of your adventures on Cybertron that was a failure." Sinesi=
s said. Sinister shook his head.

      "Unbelievable." Sinister said. Stro=
nghold and Blender look at eahc other. They laugh at Plintissa and Dracona'=
s misfortune and take a smoke, then walk off to find another side to join, =
all the time hoping that Artist suffers and hoping that Twister really is a=
nd always will be a failure...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
  From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Satu=
rday, August 05, 2000 3:22 AM
        Subject: Re: The End is Near.........=
..


        Twister/Blizzard


        *Twister looks at what was left of =
the base*

        Twister: I always be nothing but a failer with nowhere t=
o go...

        *Twister walks next to the pieces of the base sits down st=
aring at the ground*


        *Blizzard frowns and a mech tear runs out of=
 her optic*

        Blizzard: I'll never have a place to stay that I can a=
ctually call home.....

        *Blizzard lowers her head and sighs*

     =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:10 AM
      =
    Subject: The End is Near...........


          Dracona looked into the=
 pit. Plintissa wasn't moving. Dracona smiled and walked back toward her ba=
se. A dagger flew into Dracona's back. She spun around and grabbed the dagg=
er in pain. Plintissa stood there.

          "You do not know when to give=
 up, you fool, but never mind that your an idiot, I'm going to grind you so=
 small you won't be able to be seen with a microscope!" Dracona said. She k=
ept her hand covered and flung the dagger back. It missed Plintissa and hit=
 Artist in the leg. Dracona smiled in satisfaction. Plintissa tackled Dacon=
a and took her down. Dracona once again turned to her saw blade to saw into=
 Plintissa. Dracona fired an ice beam, but Plintissa dodged. Dracona starte=
d to burn everything with fire beams. Plintissa still avoids it. Plintissa =
was always a good fighter, but it wasn't until now, after her bad life that=
 she discovered her true fighting power. Plintissa beat Dracona mercilessly=
. Draocona's parts were flung everywhere as Plintissa spun a simple stick t=
hrough the air. Dracona raised the saw blade and sliced the stick to pieces=
. Dracona laughed and sliced Plintissa several hundred times. Plintissa fel=
l.

          "Th weak move aside and die so the strong can survive. As anc=
ient as the Cosmos, that has always been the way of things. I'm sorry Plint=
issa, you were a good friend, but don't take this personally, it's just bus=
iness." Dracona said.
           
          Dracona pulled back the saw bla=
de and thrust it towards Plintissa. Plintissa grabbed her arm from earlier =
and threw it. It hit Dracona's blade. Dracona slammed it into Plintissa, bu=
t as she did, the blade came loose before it hit Plintissa. The blade flew =
up. Dracona blinked her eye, the one Dinobot had scarred when she first ari=
ved on the planet. The blade sawed through Dracona and left her in pieces e=
verywhere. Her spark extinguished. Her last words were:

          "*Cough,=
 Cough* Zardus I am sorry. Plintissa, do not forget your promise." And Drac=
ona died smiling. Plintissa remembered that she promised Dracona that she w=
ould never leave her sitting. Plintissa cried. Her mech fluid ran everywher=
e and she got weaker and weaker. Artist stepped slowly over to Plintissa. H=
e was crying, too.

          "Artist, I'm sorry it had to end this way." P=
lintissa whispered.

          "Why are you leaving me, Plintissa? Why does=
 everyone betray me?" Artist asked.

          "Artist, there floats Dracon=
a's spark, recover it, we can't part, she really was my friend." Artist wal=
ked up and captured the extinguished spark as it tried to fly away. He cont=
ained it in a capsule.

          "Plintissa, if you leave me, I'll...have =
no more reason to live, all my friends are gone, my helping days are over."=
 Artist said.

          "Your helping days are never over, and we'll alway=
s be together." Plintissa said.

          "This isn't some lame thing abou=
t how you'll always be in my heart, is it?"

          "No, Artist, come he=
re." Plintissa whispered. Artist looked at Team Ultima's base. It was destr=
oyed, the funny thing was, that it was destroyed by Dracona, the very one, =
along with Plintissa, that originally built it. And there it was, sticking =
above ground now and burning away. Sinesis looks at the base and sighs.

  =
        "Twister, Dracona is dead, I guess we have to leave." Sinesis says.=
 Sinister stands next to Blizzard and sighs.

          "Blizzard, we need =
to find another home, now." Sinister said sadly.

          Artist came clo=
ser to Plintissa. Her spark suddenly burst from her and floated into Artist=
's hands. She said to him what he needed to do. He opened his chest compart=
ment and his spark was revealed. Artist combined Plintissa's spark with his=
 own, they became one.

          "Till all are one." Artist whispered real=
ly low. Plintissa told him she still loved him. Artist was overjoyed! Plint=
issa was with him now, and now they could never be seperated again. Artist,=
 completely ignoring Blizzard and Sinister, and Sinesis and Twister. ran ou=
t into a field.

          "Artist, now we need to take care of Dracona's s=
park." Plintissa said. (Remember, only Artist can hear Plintissa now) Artis=
t headed toward the Maximal base, there Dracona would get a new body, one s=
he could not attack anyone ever again in, and where she can always be helpf=
ul. Artist held up the contained, Dracona's spark still inside.

          =
"I love you." Artist said seemingly to nobody.

          "I love you too."=
 Plintissa said to Artist. Artist continued walking to the Maximal base...
=
